TopicTitle: Where are Jeb, Bill and Bob now?

Articles.Content:
0.17s has been out for a while, where are our favourite kerbalnaughts hanging out in your game(s)?

Jeb is currently standing on Ike, he's got enough fuel to get back into a Duna orbit but no chance of getting back to Kerbal in that craft.

Bill is currently orbiting Jool, probably going to have him land on one of the moons if I can.

Bob splashed into Kerbins ocean after I was messing around spinning his craft around during the deorbit burn to use all the fuel (waste not want not!). The parachute deployed but he's miles from anything. I'll assume he'll find his way back to a spacecraft soon enough.

Where are your Bills, Bobs and Jebs hanging out?

Jeb crash-landed on top of a 6km high mountain on Eve, currently walking down to somewhere level enough for a rescue ship to pick him up in a year or so.

Bill and Bob are both sitting in the 'Kerbal Arms' pub on Kerbin awaiting their next assignment.
Bill, Bob and Jeb are all currently orbiting Kerbol after running out of fuel during a missed shot for Duna.
Jeb, Bill and Bob are orbiting Eve in the Minerva II survey ship. Bill's ready to come home, Jeb wants to land, and Bob can't find his sandwich.
Bill jeb and bob where shot down by daleks

I started with a fresh persistence.

Bill, Bob and Jeb are have yet to show up.

All my crafts are 3-crew style so I list all vessels here:

IPL-1 landed@Duna

IPO-1 orbiting Jool

IPL-2-2 waiting for intercepting Eve

IPL-2-3 waiting for intercepting Moho

MR-1(Rover) landed@Minimus

IPR-1(Rover) waiting for intercepting Eve

Dead.

LOLJK

Jeb is in an "orbital fighter" I made and shot out to Laythe.

Bill is being eaten by the Space Cthulhu. (My ship blew apart in time-warp)

Bob is still flying regular flights as I test my minimalist Eve rescue craft.

Bob, well there's two Bobs now:

Jebidiah and Bill are driving in their sick new Muncar:

AND there is a second Bill on Duna!

Any more questions?

Mine are the first glorious kerbals and Duna since monday - and are stuck there after running out of fuel due to an haphazard launch window and picnic on Ike. But then there was the matter of the rescue team featuring Bill, Bob and Jeb too! So those are hanging out in a module landed on Kerbin so the new rescue team can have different names.
Well, Jeb, Bob and Bill are in orbit around Kerbin in a modified Mun lander.

Jeb is currently in a kerbin ocean miles from anything.(Engine blew up due to over heating.) luckily he was slightly out of the atmosphere and I got the parachute deployed in time. Bill and bob are in a orbit around kerbol never to return... I think jeb might of died I have to check that mission...
Jeb, Bill and Bob are orbiting Gilly. Because I can't land there without exploding. Damn Bugs!!!

Jeb is currently in a kerbin ocean miles from anything.(Engine blew up due to over heating.) luckily he was slightly out of the atmosphere and I got the parachute deployed in time. Bill and bob are in a orbit around kerbol never to return... I think jeb might of died I have to check that mission...

You killed Jeb? IMPOSSIBRU!

On 1 crew member rockets, starting fresh for 0.17, Jeb tried my firsts, new and fresh Veronique (http://www.astronautix.com/lvs/vernique.htm) designs. As I left him in orbit, finding that the 2d version was underpowered,

I sent Bob to Minmum with Veronique 3. The fly was successfull, but, not used to land on Minmus (I was away from my computer most of the time during the release of version 0.16, and so, a bit rusty on KSP), I used too mush fuel to land on Minmus.

The landing was just perfect, tho.

But, there was not enough fuel left, and so Bob now orbit Kerbin. I hope he enjoy the view.

As for Bill, he also tried Veronique 3 and this time, he managed to get on Mun.

Sadly, the Kraken, being probably bored, wrapped his tentacles around the rocket legs and pulled them into the Munar soil, resulting in a failure :

I started fresh with 0.17. They were part of my very first mission, which managed to place all 3 Kerbonauts safely on the surface of the Mun where they still remain awaiting the arrival of more ships to establish a Mun base. Their ship should have the fuel necessary to return to Kerbin when the time comes.

Bill is floating dead in the gas of Jool.

Bob is broken ship on escape trillions of meters from the sun.

Jeb is in a mk1 splashed down on Eve.

Jeb, Bill and Bob were onboard my very first flight in 0.17; it was a routine LKO flight to test out the new parts, check the engine rebalance and test IVAs... routine, yet GORGEOUS.

Now, they are training on the ground at KSC, in anticipation of Kerbalkind's first crewed interplanetary flight: an orbital mission to Eve or a Dunian landing, I haven't decided yet.
Jeb, Bob and Bill are circling the sun, because they fricking lost their drive, when they came out of warp!
Jeb is in orbit around Kerbin, Bob is in a solar orbit since I screwed up the timing for a transfer to Duna, and Bill... well, who knows?
Jeb is in a rover on Duna, waiting to be picked up and Bill and Bob are on Kerbin.

Jeb: Dead

Bob: Dead

Bill: Dead

Munwise however, has been on Mun for almost 3 years.

Nice name .

Bill, Bob, and Jeb are currently at the Mun Arch! Jeb fell off the arch in a moment of stupidity but he's alright. There's enough fuel in my ship for a return trip, but for now they will stay on the Mun.
Bill, Jeb, and Bob are currently enjoying a vacation aboard Duna Sation 1
Mine are on Bop.
